MV SSI DARING
VESSEL (IMO) : SSI DARING (EX. ASIAN BULKER) (9755919)
BUILD : 2017
FLAG :MARSHALL ISLAND
TYPE : BULK CARRIER
SDWT : 36227.9 METRIC TONNES
SDRAFT : 10.13 METRES
LOA : 179.8 METRES
BEAM : 30.44 METRES
HOLDS : 5
CAPACITY : GRAIN / BALE
HOLD #1 : 6139.96 CBM / 5875.25 CBM
HOLD #2 : 9831.92 CBM / 9570.43 CBM
HOLD #3 : 9938.6 CBM / 9671.37 CBM
HOLD #4 : 9938.63 CBM / 9671.35 CBM
HOLD #5 : 8875.5 CBM / 8641.35 CBM
TOTAL : 44724.61 CBM / 43429.75 CBM
HATCHES : KYORITSU KIKAI LTD, FOLDING TYPE
HATCH DIM #1 : 14 X 16
HATCH DIM #2 : 20 X 20.40
HATCH DIM #3 : 20 X 20.40
HATCH DIM #4 : 20 X 20.40
HATCH DIM #5 : 20 X 20.40
TANKTOP STR #1 : 25.0 MT/SQM
TANKTOP STR #2 : 25.0 MT/SQM
TANKTOP STR #3 : 25.0 MT/SQM
TANKTOP STR #4 : 25.0 MT/SQM
TANKTOP STR #5 : 25.0 MT/SQM
SPEED/CONS : 13 KN (L) ON ABT 23 +0.2MT/DAY MGO / 13 KN (B) ON ABT 20 +
0.2 MT/DAY MGO
ECO  : 11.5 KN (L) ON ABT 17.2 +0.2MT/DAY MGO / 12 KN (B) ON ABT
15.2 + 0.2 MT/DAY MGO
PORT WORK : ABT 4.8 MT/DAY / 0.2 MT/DAY
PORT IDLE : ABT 2.3 MY/DAY / 0.2 MT/DAY
CLASS : NIPPON KAIJI KYOKAI
TPC : 48.16 MT
GRT : 22522
NRT : 11365
CRANES : 4 X 30
HULL : DOUBLEHULL
CALL SIGN : 9V3409
P AND I : SKULD
ISPS : LEVEL 1
PEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) AND SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS LOADED LESS THAN VESSEL'S MAX SUMMER LOADLINE,  AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 24 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY,
CONGESTED WATERS, STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS.
IF SEA WATER TEMPERATURE IS BELOW 15 DEGREE CELCIUS THERE WILL BE EXTRA BOILER CONSUMPTION.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS,
FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS,
CHARTERERS MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER
WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY CALCULATION FOR GOOD WEATHER DAYS SHALL BE ONLY APPLICABLE AND LIMITED FOR THE GOOD WEATHER DAYS ONLY AND CANNOT BE SPREAD ALL OVER THE ENTIRE VOYAGE.
OPL BUNKERING IS NOT ALLOWED.
-BUNKER QUALITY:
DURING CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, BUNKERS  TO BE SUPPLIED SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH MIN ISO 8217:2017 SPECIFICATION OR ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
-VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
-LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER, CHARTERERS ARE ONLY PERMITTED TO SUPPLY ABOVE GRADES TO THE VESSEL.
VESSEL CAN ONLY BE BUNKERED UP TO 85 PCT OF TANK CAPACITY. COMMINGLING OF DIFFERENT BUNKER STEMS NOT ALLOWED
